Key:
All right, why don't we go to Tengu Tower? What do
you say, Rio?
Okay, if you're going to go Papa, I'll go.
It's perfect for a stroll. You want to hold hands?
Yeah!

(I held Rio's small hand. It reminded me a little of
holding hands with Kotori. It's such a rare thing to
hold hands with a child.)
Papa, your hand is warm.
Yeah? So is yours, Rio.
Papa and Rio are the same.
Yeah, we are.
Wow, that was fast.
Yeah, it went fast because I was with you!
Hey, darling!
And a cute girl!
Disbelief. Shido, what are you doing here?
Oh, um...
Papa is on a stroll with Rio.
P-Papa?! Darling... is this girl... your hidden child?!
Wonder. Shido, you had a secret child...

No, I didn't! And how old would I have been when I
had this child?!
My... darling, such a pervert at such a young age.

Can you not say things that give people the wrong
idea?!
Papa... You're a pervert?

Well, guys kind of are to a certain point... Hey, no!
She's Tonomachi's relative. I'm taking care of her for
a little while.
Tonomachi-san? Who's that?
My frie... No, classmate.
Oh, is that so? Anyways, she's oh-so adorable.

Agreed. It's hard to believe she's a relative of
Tonomachi's. She does look worthy of adoration.
Rio is cute? Miku-san and Yuzuru-chan?
Yes. Veeeery adorable.
...Oh? You know my name?
Wonder. How was such information leaked?

Yuzuru, why are you thinking like that... I guess
Tonomachi told her? And Miku, you're a famous
person.
Makes sense. You're right. That seems likely.

Hehehe. Good girl, good girl. Oh, would you like to go
karaoke with us?

Karaoke? Well, I guess if we continue to walk, it
could be tiring. What do you want to do, Rio?

Miku-chan and Yuzuru-chan are both good singers,
right? Then Rio wants to hear!
My, thank youuu. Yuzuru-san, is that okay with you?
Affirmative. Of course. Will you sit next to Yuzuru?
Hey! Yuzuru-san, no fair!
Will you sing too, Rio?
Papa, you want to hear Rio sing?
Yeah. I definitely do.
Then only for you!

(And so we all went to karaoke. Supposedly it was
Rio's first time but she seemed to have a lot of fun
singing alone or in duets with others.)

(Satisfied, we left and saw that the sky outside was
red.)
Rio has to go soon.
Oh, is it time to see Marina?
Yeah. I promised her.
I see. Did you have fun?
Yes. I had a lot of fun.
Okay, good.
Well... Bye, Miku-chan, Yuzuru-chan. Let's sing again!
Okay, I look forward to it!

Agreed. Next time it would be fun to have Kaguya and
the others with us as well.
Oh, I agree! The more the merrier!
Hey, you two... Say bye to her.
Reunite. Goodbye, Rio. Let's hang out again.
Bye-bye, Rio-chaaaan. Let's hang out again!
Okay! I can't wait to sing again!

(...Hey wait. I had something to ask Marina and I totally
forgot. Oh well, next time I see her―)
I forgot to tell you something, Papa.
Hm? What is it?
If you're going to visit today... Park, okay?
(Rio whispered into my ear.)
...Okay.
Bye-bye!
Darling, what did Rio-chan say?

...She said thanks for today. That's nice. Rio seemed
to have a lot of fun.
(I couldn't tell her what Rio told me.)
Relief. She really is a good child.
Yeah. I agree.

(I remembered how happy the three looked, holding
microphones together, and I smiled.)
